attr.title: Doom II RPG
attr.desc: DOOM II RPG is a follow-up in the style of the Wolfenstein RPG, chronologically set before the events in DOOM RPG. Thanks to secret experiments, the various UAC Bases on Mars, the Moon, Earth and wherever else the cooperation has set foot have experienced incidents involving demons. A team of soldiers including a scientist are sent to Tycho Station on the Moon to investigate.
attr.inst: Search for "Doom 2 RPG.ipa" on archive.org to get the original mobile game assets file: and copy the "Doom 2 RPG.ipa" file into the doom2rpg folder.
